reviews.review: Sinceramente un buen juego, pero es una lastima tantos chiteros que el juego se vuelve horrible.

played a lil bit , really cool

I can't believe people would play this game, it's horrible.
Immediate no from me

Le matchmaking est vraiment naze, il vaut mieux aller vers du faceit ou ESEA. Bien que les débuts seront difficile du a un trop grands nombres smurf depuis que le jeu est passé gratui. Le jeu reste très bien mais pourrait être mieux.

该游戏除了在日服遇到俄罗斯人很恶心以外还有绿色信用也会有外挂以外都挺好的
信誉高的挂还是和少的  莫名其妙被人家举报到红信真的很难·!
Это наркотик. сыграв однажды хочется еще

Very good game , but the least I can say is this game has 1 major flaw. The community. Some are good , some are bad. But others are just way too much. They start swearing and throwing insults at you like your just a nobody. It truly made me feel mad. I know we can't do anything about it , because everyone has their own mindset and the way they think of it , but it has become very tiring.
Düşmanın ilk mermisi her zaman "Headshot" gider, sen sıkarsın "99" hit vurur ölürsün. CS:GO ya hoş geldiniz.
idk what to say but its very fun even if your bad and i suck but i still enjoy the game
It's fun if you don't take it too seriously.
je to sračka, ale mám ji rád
Gosto muito do espirito de competição a volta da Comunidade de CS, pena ter tantos tóxicos misturados na comunidade sejam eles scammers, hackers ou mesmo os griffers (trolls).
